N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 975.11 - Provision for the elderly and transit disabled

State Regulations
A system shall also provide reduced fares for elderly and
transit disabled persons in off-peak periods to the extent necessary to enable
the public transportation system to apply for Federal operating assistance
payments. In the event a local public transportation system does not comply
with these requirements, the Commissioner may reject the application, in whole
or part, or delay quarterly service payments to the system until it fully
complies, or demonstrates that it will comply fully, at the earliest possible
date. Notes
